comment: Wondering how this turned out? How close was it to the real thing? Thanks

http://www.brewtoad.com/recipes/founders-all-day-ipa-3 
this one is closer to the recipe.  also see the homebrewtalk thread.  we are also talking about a small amount of rye.
Thanks. I'm surprised you removed the corn, as the Founders brewer confirmed they use it. To be honest, I'm not sure why they add it. Thanks for the help.
Check out my recipe called "Love You Long Time IPA". I just finished it, it's about spot on but could use a tiny bit more of the grapefruit flavor (maybe use a fruiter hop at 20 minutes).
